Top Picks For Game-Based Learning

Below are some of the most popular applications (especially for math/science/programming) for game-based learning today. Click on the application's name to learn more.

  • Minecraft: Education Edition
  • Physics, programming, or social studies applications
  • Amazon Cyber Robotics
  • Great for teaching programming
  • DimensionU
  • Appropriate for developing math or literacy skills
  • Math Snacks
  • Resource for teaching middle school mathematics
  • Prodigy
  • Interactive game for teaching math
  • Portal 2
  • An exciting world that can be used to teach physics

Works Cited

Sullivan-Carr, Margaret. “Game-Based Learning and Children with ADHD.” 2016, core.ac.uk/download/pdf/190323442.pdf.

Admiraal, Wilfried, et al. “The Concept of Flow in Collaborative Game-Based Learning.” Computers in Human Behavior, vol. 27, no. 3, 2011, pp. 1185–1194., doi:10.1016/j.chb.2010.12.013. Accessed 28 Oct. 2020.

Armstrong, Amanda. Game-Based Learning in Middle School Math. 24 Feb. 2020, www.edutopia.org/article/game-based-learning-middle-school-math.

DimensionU. Educational Video Game Technology for the 21st Century Student. www.dimensionu.com/dimu/home/Reslt.aspx?ref=footer.

Edutopia, director. James Paul Gee on Learning with Video Games. 2012, www.youtube.com/watch?v=JnEN2Sm4IIQ. Accessed 28 Oct. 2020.

“Gee Principles on Gaming.” Performance by James Paul Gee, 2013, www.youtube.com/watch?v=4aQAgAjTozk&t=233s. Accessed 28 Oct. 2020.

Kang, Heera. How Game-Based Learning Can Support Strong Math Practices. 2018, blog.mindresearch.org/blog/game-based-learning-infographic.

MathSnacks. Math Snacks Research. 2015, mathsnacks.com/research.html.

Pechuel, Rasmus, and Marc Beutner. “Game-Based Learning for Teachers: A Journey Through a World of New Ideas!” EduProject, 2018, eduproject.eu/game-based-learning/downloads/GameOn-Book-V1.pdf.

Pexels. www.pexels.com/discover/.

University of Waterloo. Gamification and Game-Based Learning. 1 Mar. 2018, uwaterloo.ca/centre-for-teaching-excellence/teaching-resources/teaching-tips/educational-technologies/all/gamification-and-game-based-learning.

Wright, Calli. Educator Perspectives: How to Start Incorporating Games Into the Classroom. 2018, blog.mindresearch.org/blog/game-based-learning-examples.
